_header: Even as merry as I make might
_description: A letter by a lady to her real love — four quatrains

BodRawC813.First Lines: Evyn as mery as I make myght…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…ytt shalbe to your vnderstandyngI haue nott all my
                    wyll
